title: The Sentinel
description: The best collection ever of Arthur C. Clarke's short fiction, including the stories on which 2001: A Space Odyssey and Childhood's End were based.The Sentinel include:Introduction: Of Sand and Stars"Rescue Party""Guardian Angel""Breaking Strain""The Sentinel""Jupiter V""Refugee""The Wind from the Sun""A Meeting with Medusa""The Songs of Distant Earth"The Contributors
author: Arthur C. Clarke
